name: Blood Moon (itch) (Luminous Wolf)
description:
Game for Game Jam 2022 at Casual Dragon Games. The theme was It's Morphing Time.

Fight to be the best vampire ninja in this 2-player fighting game! The moonlight transforms you, making your attacks stronger, but it also makes you more vulnerable to your enemy's attacks!

Programming, Design........Luminous Wolf

Character Art.......................Colleen Ekat

Weapon and UI Art............Jeremy Schiele (podunkuu)

Background Art...................David (Bebop00)

Main Menu Art....................Mark Miller of Ichiban Games

Music.....................................photosbyaturtl (Tasha Cook)
